Interface ITransformable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IColorizable, IDestructible, IDrawable, IDrawTransform, IInputHandler, IPositionable, ISignalHandler, IVisualElement, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IButton, IImageDrawable, ITextDrawable

    public interface ITransformable
extends IDrawable

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseTransform

        Matrix getBaseTransform()
        See Also:
        getTransform()

      • getTransform

        Matrix getTransform()
        The transform is obtained by modifying the base transform with this drawable's X/Y position, scale, rotation. The image align isn't included in the transform.
        Specified by:
        getTransform in interface IDrawable
        Specified by:
        getTransform in interface IDrawTransform
        Returns:
        The final transformation matrix used when rendering this drawable.
        See Also:
        getBaseTransform()

      • getRotation

        double getRotation()
        Returns:
        The current rotation between 0 and 512.

      • getScaleX

        double getScaleX()
        Returns:
        The horizontal scaling factor.
        See Also:
        setScale(double, double)

      • getScaleY

        double getScaleY()
        Returns:
        The vertical scaling factor.
        See Also:
        setScale(double, double)

      • getAlignX

      • getAlignY

        double getAlignY()
        See Also:

      • getAlignOffsetX

        double getAlignOffsetX()
        Returns:
        getAlignX() multiplied by the current width.

      • getAlignOffsetY

        double getAlignOffsetY()
        Returns:
        getAlignY() multiplied by the current height.

      • setBaseTransform

        void setBaseTransform(Matrix transform)

        void rotate(double r)
        Adjusts the current rotation.

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(double rot)
        Parameters:
        rot - The new rotation between 0 and 512.

      • scale

        void scale(double s)
        Adjusts the current scale.
        See Also:
        scale(double, double), setScale(double)

        void scale(double sx,
           double sy)
        Adjusts the current scale.
        See Also:

      • setScale

        void setScale(double s)
        Sets the horizontal and vertical scale factors to the same value.
        See Also:
        setScale(double, double)

      • setScale

        void setScale(double sx,
              double sy)
        Sets the horizontal and vertical scaling factors for this transformable.

      • setAlign

        void setAlign(double xFrac,
              double yFrac)
        Changes the display position of this transformable relative to its X/Y coordinates. An x-align value of 0.0 uses the left, 0.5 uses the center and 1.0 is right-aligned.
        Parameters:
        xFrac - Relative display position from the X-coordinate.
        yFrac - Relative display position from the Y-coordinate.

      • setUnscaledSize

        void setUnscaledSize(double w,
                     double h)
        Sets the size before scaling. The final size is the unscaled times multiplied by the scale factors.
